ai-tha-ap380:1.1_0: “There is no need for the Fortunate One,
ai-tha-ap380:1.4_0: I take a very great sacrifice,
ai-tha-ap380:2.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap380:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap380:2.4_0: as she was the fruit she took a fruit.
ai-tha-ap380:4.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap380:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sumana.
ai-tha-ap380:7.1_0: The eighth of the Elders Queen Subhaddā
